# Building the documentation

This documentation is generated by [Rgitbook](http://jason.bryer.org/Rgitbook/).

It allows inserting R chucnks in the documention and have these executed when building. 

This means all examples provided in the documention use the rOpenSearch (and other packages) to generate the content.

## Install the dependencies

The recipe provide here targets a CentOS 6.5 environment, adapt it to your environment.
